description: Enable AI assistants to seamlessly manage and automate your n8n workflows. Create, execute, update, and monitor workflows directly through AI integration, enhancing your automation capabilities. Simplify workflow lifecycle management with secure, high-performance tools designed for AI-first environments.

capabilities.name: list_workflows
capabilities.description: List all workflows from your n8n instance. Returns a comprehensive list of all workflows with their IDs, names, status (active/inactive), creation dates, and basic metadata. Perfect for getting an overview of your automation landscape.

capabilities.name: create_workflow
capabilities.description: Create a new workflow in n8n with custom nodes, connections, and settings. Build complex automation workflows programmatically by defining nodes (triggers, actions, conditions) and their relationships. Supports all n8n node types and advanced workflow configurations.

capabilities.name: get_workflow
capabilities.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific workflow by its ID. Returns complete workflow configuration including all nodes, connections, settings, triggers, and metadata. Essential for inspecting workflow structure before making modifications.

capabilities.name: execute_workflow
capabilities.description: Trigger immediate execution of a workflow by its ID. Starts the workflow manually regardless of its normal triggers (webhooks, schedules, etc.). Returns execution details including status, start time, and any immediate results or errors.

capabilities.name: update_workflow
capabilities.description: Modify an existing workflow by updating its configuration, nodes, connections, or settings. Supports partial updates - you can change specific aspects without affecting the entire workflow. Perfect for iterative workflow development and maintenance.

capabilities.name: activate_workflow
capabilities.description: Enable a workflow to start processing triggers and executing automatically. Once activated, the workflow will respond to its configured triggers (webhooks, schedules, file changes, etc.) and run according to its automation logic.

capabilities.name: deactivate_workflow
capabilities.description: Disable a workflow to stop it from processing triggers and executing automatically. The workflow will remain in your n8n instance but won't respond to triggers until reactivated. Useful for maintenance, debugging, or temporary suspension.

capabilities.name: delete_workflow
capabilities.description: Permanently remove a workflow from your n8n instance. This action cannot be undone - the workflow, its configuration, nodes, and execution history will be completely deleted. Use with caution for cleanup and workflow lifecycle management.
